name: RuboClaus
tagline: Ruby method pattern matching inspired by functional programming with Elixir and Erlang
body:
### Welcome
RuboClaus is a pattern matching gem. More information will be added here soon. 

### Core Contributors
Omid Bachari (@omidbachari), Craig P Jolicoeur (@cpjolicoeur)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
